item.title: E-Cigarettes Lose to the Administrative State at the Supreme Court
item.description: Justice Alito warns judges not to flyspeck executive decisions too closely.

item.title: Major Infant-Mortality Study Was Edited to Preserve Racial ‘Perspective’
item.description: Researchers deliberately obscured a data point about white babies under the care of black physicians because it ‘undermines the narrative.’

item.title: A Disappointment in Wisconsin
item.description: The failure to reclaim the state’s high court will have large-scale consequences given the activism of the liberal majority.
